Name: Ballrun 3D Marble Maze Speedrun
About the game: BallRun is a balance the ball 3D maze that will develop a whole new hand eye coordination skill set that will challenge even the most experienced gamers. Using realistic physics, the balancing algorithm precisely simulates a 3D wood and wire marble run. Twist and turn the maze to manipulate your marble through a series of challenging puzzles. Each run through the maze is automatically recorded, allowing you to chase your own ghost and that of up to 100 other players. Take the leader board challenge to see of you have what it takes to become the top BallRunner. Features: - realistic physics simulation. - leader boards for the quickest and / or most accurate run. - race against yourself and up to 100 other leader board ghosts. - spacey music - customize your ball appearance. - customize the maze color. You choose to play BallRun and do the other things, not because it is easy, but because it is hard, because the goal will serve to organize and measure the best BallRunners and their skills, because that challenge is one that you are willing to accept, one you are unwilling to postpone, and one which you intend to win.
